articles.title: This doctor left a 'perfect' American life to care for protesting farmers in India. Now, he can't imagine leaving
articles.description: Dr. Swaiman Singh extended his stay to 10 days, then two weeks and then three. Months later, he's still there -- and can't imagine leaving.
articles.content:
(CNN)When Dr. Swaiman Singh boarded a flight to India last December, he thought he would be there for a week, tops.

articles.title: Brown: Gov. Andrew Cuomo is not following his own advice
articles.description: In 2018, New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo called for former New York Attorney General Eric Schneiderman's resignation over misconduct allegations made against him. CNN's Pamela Brown says based on his past statements, Cuomo is not following his own advice.

articles.author: Julia Hollingsworth and Adam Renton, CNN
articles.title: From diplomat to detective, this man helped bring Asia's notorious 'Serpent' killer to justice
articles.description: Former Dutch diplomat Herman Knippenberg recalls his role in catching serial killer Charles Sobhraj -- nicknamed "the Serpent" and "the Bikini Killer" -- following a spate of murders of Western tourists in Asia in the 1970s.
articles.content:
• 1944Born in Saigon, Vietnam.
  • 1963Jailed for burglary in Paris, France. Serves three years.
  • 1969Returns to prison in France for car theft and evading police.

articles.title: London police officer charged in death of Sarah Everard
articles.description: A London Metropolitan Police officer has been charged with the kidnap and murder of 33-year-old Sarah Everard, whose disappearance on a walk home has reignited a national debate in Britain on women's safety and sexual assault.

articles.title: Woman arrested after refusing to wear a mask in a Texas bank
articles.description: Police body camera footage obtained by CNN affiliate KTRK shows a woman being arrested at a Galveston, Texas, bank after she refused to wear a mask or leave.
